name: MantisVR
product_desc:
At MantisVR we believe in creating unique immersive experiences for individuals, which will take them on a transformative journey of exploration, empowerment and self-discovery.
VR is the evolution of storytelling, only this time the person behind the goggles is the protagonist, the hero. With VR we are entering a new age of direct experience.
To quote Joseph Campbell: “It has always been the prime function of mythology and rite to supply the symbols that carry the human spirit forward, in counteraction to those that tend to tie it back…”
We believe this is our evolution, to be able to fully experience new worlds and new realities!  In these realms you’ll be “Ultranatural”; defying gravity, moving objects with your mind, ride mythical beasts, conquer fears.
To sum it up the experiences you’ll be enjoying at MantisVR are a mix of the Holodeck, James Cameron’s Avatar and Dagobah (Where Luke trained with Yoda).
Sci-fi fans wanting to pay a premiun to be fully immerse in virtual worlds.
